verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* \w I|strong="H6869"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.

“\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lip|strong="H8193"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* crafty.”

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* crafty? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w yet|strong="H3254"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w Arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w*, \w sharpened|strong="H8150"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* glowing \w broom|strong="H7574"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w together|strong="H5973"\w*.

Woe \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H7931"\w* \w by|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5973"\w* \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*.

Already \w too|strong="H7227"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w have|strong="H7965"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.
